references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a key technology for efficient high-resolution image synthesis, influencing many subsequent video generation models.

references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces CogVideoX, which is one of the base models that the current paper, Temporal Regularization Makes Your Video Generator Stronger, uses and improves with their FLUXFLOW approach.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive benchmark suite for video generative models
references.reason: This paper introduces VBench, one of the benchmarks the current paper uses to evaluate the proposed FLUXFLOW method.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper presents a method for high-resolution image synthesis, which informs the development of modern video generation architectures leveraging large-scale image priors.

references.paper_title: Videocrafter2: Overcoming data limitations for high-quality video diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents VideoCrafter2, which is one of the base models that the current paper, Temporal Regularization Makes Your Video Generator Stronger, uses and improves with their FLUXFLOW approach.
